name: I'm The Cure
description:
Controls

W walking forward

S to go back

D to walk right

A to walk left

Space to jump

Ctrl to bend down

Shift to run

informations

This is a trial version of the game

We want to put the entire game on Steam, depending on the support for the game

The full story of the game

In the year 3486, the world was destroyed because of the invention of robots, and robots are the ones who lost their control over them and killed humans, and you and some of the few people who survived, and now you have to adventure and explore the world and reach the largest robot that makes robots and destroy it and save the world
